name: Word Gram PRO
description:
Word Gram is an original highscores word search game with 4 game modes and thousands of hidden words to be found! WIll you make it into TOP20?

How to play: Tap on letters to create a word! Create as many words as you can before the top of the board is reached! Each word must have 3-10 letters! Longer words give you better score! If you are out of letters, you can add new ones by pressing "+" button in the top left corner!

Game Modes:
Challenge - 1 new letters is added to each used column + into 2 random columns
Quick - Each found word will add new letters into every column
Attack - New letters are added periodically into each column
48 Letters - You have only 48 letters! Get the best score possible and submit it via Menu button!

Features
* 4 game modes - Challenge, Quick, Attack and 48 Letters
* Over 150K English words to be found
* Set your background style
* Global leaderboards included - compare your score with other people from all around the world!
* Review your words at the end of the game
* Setup your own settings - turn on/off explosion effect, show/hide points on the letters
* Great fun for all ages
* No ads and In-App purchases
